location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham at Bussora (Basra)

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged with a large section of text missing in the top left corner of it.

mods.abstract: The letter states that a letter for the council in Bombay is enclosed and requests that it be forwarded on as soon as possible (it is not contained in the file). The letter also reports other developments from Basra including the seizure of an Armenian merchant and requests that the Vakeel (referring to Karim Khan) be informed of their ongoing problems.
